description: Adds or updates an authentication method for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application with the authentication method to add or update.

parameters.name: AuthenticationMethodType
parameters.description: Specifies the type of the authentication method that you want to add or update.

parameters.name: AuthenticationMethod
parameters.description: Specifies a structure that describes the authentication method to add or update. The structure type you provide is determined by the AuthenticationMethodType parameter. Iam (dict) --- A structure that describes details for IAM authentication. An IAM policy document in JSON.

nested_params.name: Iam
nested_params.description: A structure that describes details for IAM authentication.

nested_params.name: ActorPolicy
nested_params.description: An IAM policy document in JSON.
